title: Licca-chan Fushigi na Fushigi na Yunia Monogatari
original_name: Licca ふしぎな不思議なユーニア物語
opening_song: "Hitomi no Naka no Rinbu (瞳の中の輪舞)" by Licca Kayama (香山リカ)
ending_song: "Yume no Shizuku (夢のしずく)" by Licca Kayama (香山リカ)
sinopse: Based on the popular Licca doll in Japan. Licca is accidentally transported into the world of Yunia and must find a way to return home.
